wiki.content:
Crazy World is a studio album by the German heavy metal band Scorpions released in 1990. Crazy World peaked at number 21 on Billboard 200 Chart for albums in 1990. The song "Wind of Change" reached number four on the Billboard Hot 100 in 1991, and "Send Me an Angel" reached number 44 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart.
 
 
 Track listing
 "Tease Me Please Me" (Matthias Jabs, Jim Vallance, Klaus Meine, Herman Rarebell) – 4:44 
 "Don't Believe Her" (Rudolf Schenker, Vallance, Rarebell, Meine) – 4:55 
 "To Be with You in Heaven" (Schenker, Meine) – 4:48 
 "Wind of Change" (Meine) – 5:10 
 "Restless Nights" (Schenker, Meine, Rarebell, Vallance) – 5:44 
 "Lust or Love" (Meine, Rarebell, Vallance) – 4:22 
 "Kicks After Six" (Francis Buchholz, Vallance, Rarebell, Meine) – 3:49 
 "Hit Between the Eyes" (Schenker,Rarebell, Meine, Vallance) – 4:33 
 "Money and Fame" (Jabs, Rarebell) – 5:06 
 "Crazy World" (Schenker, Meine, Rarebell, Vallance) – 5:08 
 "Send Me an Angel" (Schenker, Meine) – 4:34 
 
 Personnel
 Klaus Meine - Vocals 
 Rudolf Schenker - Guitars 
 Matthias Jabs - Guitars 
 Herman Rarebell - Drums 
 Francis Buchholz - Bass 
 
 Credits
 Produced by Keith Olsen 
 Mastered by Greg Fulginiti 
 
 Notes
 "Hit Between the Eyes" was played during the ending credits of the 1992 film Freejack. 
 
 
 
 Album
 Billboard (North America)
 
 Year Chart Peak position 
 1991 Billboard 200 21 
 
 
 Singles
 Billboard (North America)
 
 Year Song Peak positions 
 Billboard Hot 100 US Mainstream Rock 
 1990 "Tease Me, Please Me" - 8 
 1991 "Wind of Change" 4 2 
 1991 "Don't Believe Her" - 13 
 1991 "Send Me an Angel" 44 8

track.name: To Be With You In Heaven
